events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong item delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the product I got, which is not what I ordered.
We have reviewed the photo and confirmed the error. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your assistance in handling my refund request so efficiently.
Your refund request has been resolved successfully, and the refund will appear on your statement soon.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further help.
As your refund was processed successfully and no further assistance is needed, we are closing this case. Thank you!
